RTCDataChannelClose_event.summary: The close event is sent to the event handler on an instance when the data transport for the data channel has closed. Before any further data can be transferred using RTCDataChannel, a new 'RTCDataChannel' instance must be created.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
